ignorant.name: Clueless McDirt
ignorant.introduce: Heyyy… so… plants don’t scream if I forget to water them, right?
ignorant.preferences: I need a plant that survives on good vibes and accidental neglect.
ignorant.recommendations: Got anything that refuses to die no matter what I do?
ignorant.accept: Nice! Even I can’t mess this up. Probably.
ignorant.reject: Whoa, that sounds like effort. Hard pass.
ignorant.acceptExit: Thanks! If it dies, I’ll just blame the sun!
ignorant.rejectExit: Cool, I’ll try another shop that believes in miracles.

average.name: Patty Potplant
average.introduce: Hey there! My house is half jungle, half chaos — and I love it!
average.preferences: Looking for something cute but not dramatic. No divas allowed.
average.recommendations: Got any plants that thrive on medium chaos?
average.accept: Perfect! It’ll look amazing next to the one I almost overwatered!
average.reject: Hmm, it’s nice… but it doesn’t *speak* to my windowsill.
average.acceptExit: Awesome, thanks! My plants are gonna gossip about this one.
average.rejectExit: I’ll think about it. My vibe detector needs a recharge.

greenfinger.name: Sir Leafsalot
greenfinger.introduce: Salutations! The legend of chlorophyll welcomes you!
greenfinger.preferences: I desire a plant that challenges my mighty watering can!
greenfinger.recommendations: Show me something rare… something that fears neither drought nor doom!
greenfinger.accept: Exquisite! A worthy rival for my bonsai army!
greenfinger.reject: Bah! Too simple. I seek a plant that mocks my hubris!
greenfinger.acceptExit: Marvelous! I shall name it after myself immediately!
greenfinger.rejectExit: Farewell! I ride toward greener, riskier pastures!
